嘗.definition: to taste; to try (food); to experience; (literary) ever; once

嘗盡心酸.definition: to experience one's full share of sorrows (idiom)

嘗糞.definition: to taste a patient's excrement (a form of medical examination, seen as an act of loyalty or filial piety); to suck up to sb; to kiss ass

嘗試錯誤.definition: to proceed by trial and error; to learn by making mistakes

嘗鮮.definition: to taste (fresh food or a delicacy); (fig.) to try sth new
